div.div: TLS 1.2 or above through CDN to the server

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 171px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Secret, only the user should know this.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 221px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Private. Randomly generated for each share.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 321px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Public. Static, specific for each installation.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 271px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Secret - An attacker should not have access to this.
Private - An attacker might have access to this.
Public - An attacker has easy access to this.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
